name: Word Search - Puzzles Games
description:
Word Search is classic word puzzle game. Find the hidden words. You have to find secret words on board.

Word lists were created by a person, not by a computer, to make sure your word list is always interesting and fun. Free version comes with 16 categories, including a massive SAT Vocabulary category with more than 4000 words. 100 categories are available with a paid upgrade.

- Easy choosing letters
- Reverse word selection
- Letters grid adjusts automatically to your device
- Unlimited puzzles
- Clean colorful look
- 200+ hand-curated puzzles
- Lots of other puzzles to choose from!
- Replay categories to beat your own high-score!
